price: Dájúdájú wọ́n ti kó ọ̀pọ̀lọ́pọ̀ ṣìnà. (Olúwa mi) má ṣe jẹ́ kí àwọn alábòsí lékún ní kiní kan bí kò ṣe ìṣìnà.
arabic: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqad aḍallū kathīran walā tazidi al-ẓālimīna illā ḍalālan
